languages.text: {n}Инцендия обращает взгляд к вам.{/n} "Слуги сообщили мне о некоторых... фактах {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}биографии{/d} нового Вольного Торговца. Возможно, Каллигос, тебе стоит сделать то же самое — во избежание будущего разочарования." {n}Вы чувствуете во взгляде Чорды превосходство. Уши начинают гореть, во рту пересыхает. Она знает о вашем давнем позоре — похоже, информация о нем не прошла мимо цепких архивистов династии Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}Incendia's gaze turns to you.{/n} "My servants have brought... certain facts of the new Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biography{/d} to my attention. It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

Возможно, Каллигос, тебе стоит сделать то же самое — во избежание будущего разочарования." {n}Вы чувствуете во взгляде Чорды превосходство. Уши начинают гореть, во рту пересыхает. languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅的目光转向了你。{/n}“我的仆人给我带来了……某些情报，让我对这位新任行商浪人的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}生平{/d}有了更好地了解。你也应该好好了解一下这位新任行商浪人，卡里戈斯，除非你打算日后失望。”{n}因森蒂娅看着你，眼神中带着一丝优越感。你感觉耳朵发烫，嘴唇发干——她知道你过去曾经历过的耻辱。看起来，库尔达家族的档案保管员的工作态度有些过于敬业。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's gaze turns to you.{/n} "My servants have brought... certain facts of the new Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biography{/d} to my attention. It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅的目光转向了你。{/n}“我的仆人给我带来了……某些情报，让我对这位新任行商浪人有了更好地了解。你也应该好好了解一下这位新任行商浪人，卡里戈斯，除非你打算日后失望。”{n}因森蒂娅看着你，眼神中带着一丝优越感。你感觉耳朵发烫，嘴唇发干——她知道你过去曾经历过的耻辱。看起来，库尔达家族的档案保管员的工作态度有些过于敬业。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Incendia blickt zu dir.{/n} "Meine Diener haben mich auf ... gewisse Tatsachen aus der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Biografie{/d} {mf|des neuen Freihändlers|der neuen Freihändlerin} aufmerksam gemacht. Ihr solltet Euch vielleicht ebenfalls informieren, Calligos, wenn Ihr zukünftige Enttäuschungen vermeiden möchtet." {n}In ihren Augen funkelt Überlegenheit. Deine Ohren dröhnen und dein Mund ist trocken. Sie weiß von der Schande deiner Vergangenheit. Die akribischen Archivare von Haus Chorda haben wohl bedauerlich gute Arbeit geleistet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's gaze turns to you.{/n} "My servants have brought... certain facts of the new Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biography{/d} to my attention. It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia blickt zu dir.{/n} "Meine Diener haben mich auf ... gewisse Tatsachen aus der Biografie {mf|des neuen Freihändlers|der neuen Freihändlerin} aufmerksam gemacht. Ihr solltet Euch vielleicht ebenfalls informieren, Calligos, wenn Ihr zukünftige Enttäuschungen vermeiden möchtet." {n}In ihren Augen funkelt Überlegenheit. Deine Ohren dröhnen und dein Mund ist trocken. Sie weiß von der Schande deiner Vergangenheit. Die akribischen Archivare von Haus Chorda haben wohl bedauerlich gute Arbeit geleistet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Incendia tourne son regard vers vous.{/n} « Mes serviteurs ont porté certains... aspects de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biographie{/d} {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande} à ma connaissance. Vous devriez également vous renseigner, Calligos, si vous ne voulez pas le regretter à l'avenir. » {n}Vous décelez dans son regard un soupçon de supériorité. La gorge soudainement sèche, vous vous sentez rougir jusqu'aux oreilles. Il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle sait tout de la honte de votre passé. Les archivistes de la maison Chorda semblent avoir été particulièrement méticuleux dans leurs recherches.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's gaze turns to you.{/n} "My servants have brought... certain facts of the new Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biography{/d} to my attention. It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia tourne son regard vers vous.{/n} « Mes serviteurs ont porté certains... aspects de la biographie {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande} à ma connaissance. Vous devriez également vous renseigner, Calligos, si vous ne voulez pas le regretter à l'avenir. » {n}Vous décelez dans son regard un soupçon de supériorité. La gorge soudainement sèche, vous vous sentez rougir jusqu'aux oreilles. Il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle sait tout de la honte de votre passé. Les archivistes de la maison Chorda semblent avoir été particulièrement méticuleux dans leurs recherches.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Incendia dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Mis sirvientes han... destacado ciertos sucesos en la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biografía{/d} de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente. Tal vez le convenga investigar, Calligos, no sea que quiera llevarse una decepción». {n}Hay un toque de superioridad en su mirada. Te arden los oídos y tienes la boca seca. Conoce la vergüenza de tu pasado. Parece que los meticulosos archivistas de la casa Chorda han sido lamentablemente concienzudos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's gaze turns to you.{/n} "My servants have brought... certain facts of the new Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biography{/d} to my attention. It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Mis sirvientes han... destacado ciertos sucesos en la biografía de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente. Tal vez le convenga investigar, Calligos, no sea que quiera llevarse una decepción». {n}Hay un toque de superioridad en su mirada. Te arden los oídos y tienes la boca seca. Conoce la vergüenza de tu pasado. Parece que los meticulosos archivistas de la casa Chorda han sido lamentablemente concienzudos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの視線があなたに向けられる。{/n}「私の従者が新たな自由開拓者の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}経歴{/d}に関する、とある事実について教えてくれた。お前も知っておいたほうがいいだろう、カリゴス。将来失望する羽目に陥りたくないのであれば」{n}彼女の目には優越感が漂っている。あなたの耳は焼けるように熱く、口は乾いている。彼女はあなたの過去の恥を知っている。コーダ家の几帳面な記録係は、困ったことに有能だったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's gaze turns to you.{/n} "My servants have brought... certain facts of the new Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}biography{/d} to my attention. It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの視線があなたに向けられる。{/n}「私の従者が新たな自由開拓者の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}経歴{/d}に関する、とある事実について教えてくれた。お前も知っておいたほうがいいだろう、カリゴス。将来失望する羽目に陥りたくないのであれば」{n}彼女の目には優越感が漂っている。あなたの耳は焼けるように熱く、口は乾いている。彼女はあなたの過去の恥を知っている。コーダ家の几帳面な記録係は、困ったことに有能だったようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın bakışları sana dönüyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarım... Yeni Hür Tacir'in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}yaşam öyküsünden{/d} bazı kesitleri dikkatime sundu. Gelecekte hayal kırıklığıyla karşılaşmak istemiyorsan sana da bunları okumanı öneririm Calligos." {n}Gözlerinde bir üstünlük belirtisi var. Kulakların yanıyor, ağzın kuruyor. Geçmişinin utancını biliyor. Anlaşılan Chorda Hanesi'nin titiz arşivcileri iyi bir performans sergilemiş.{/n}

It may be wise of you to do the same, Calligos, unless you wish to face disappointment in the future." {n}There is a hint of superiority in her eyes. Your ears are burning, and your mouth is dry. She knows of the shame of your past. It would seem that the meticulous archivists of House Chorda have performed regrettably well.{/n}

Gelecekte hayal kırıklığıyla karşılaşmak istemiyorsan sana da bunları okumanı öneririm Calligos." {n}Gözlerinde bir üstünlük belirtisi var. Kulakların yanıyor, ağzın kuruyor. Geçmişinin utancını biliyor. Anlaşılan Chorda Hanesi'nin titiz arşivcileri iyi bir performans sergilemiş.{/n}
